name: i had pasta tonight
description:
a conversation about angst, anxiety, and all the fun things that come with it (not really)

---

This is more of a prototype showing off the custom NVL screen in Ren'Py I've been working on and off for the past few weeks that emulates an instant messaging app. While I need to clean up the backend of the code, everything looks the way it should. Expect a framework coming in the near-ish future.
